channel.title: Projects on Kevin Yong's Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Kevin Yong's Portfolio

item.title: Anomaly Detection in Stock Time Series Data
item.description: This short project is created to detect those anomaly points for time series data that are collected from the real world stock market. I have built the anomaly detection model to identify data points that are not able to be considered as outliers through statistical techniques. Specifically, I have trained a deep learning model-based Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) autocoder to detect the sudden price change in five years of S&P 500 index.

item.title: Telecommunication Customer Churn Prediction
item.description: Customer churn rate is an indication of how satisfied telecommunication services are offered to subscribed customers. Customers who are satisfied with the service will continue to stay as a ‘layal’ subscribers by continuing the biling lifecycle. The telecommunication companies only earn revenue when subscribers continue to pay for their services offered. Thus, the companies could retent these loyal customers if there was a prediction system to inform them early about the possibility of certain customers churning from their services.
